places_with_reviews.name: Hummerchute by Max Link
places_with_reviews.address: Gliding Operations, Amby Valley Air Strip, Aamby Valley City, Maharashtra 412108, India

reviews.text:
Great once in a lifetime Experience.
Staff was well behaved and helpful.
The ride was very safe.
One of the best things to do in lonavala.
The staff has a very good coordination within themselves and also with the customers.
Do visit once.
One of the greatest adventure I've ever experienced and the staff was great and very helpful and made me comfortable before my ride and made sure I was safe and enjoying.  Will visit again soon...

Incredible breathtaking Hummerchute ride over Aamby Valley City.😘 The scenic beauty was simply mesmerizing, making it an unforgettable experience. It truly felt like a dream come true, and I'll cherish the memories forever.🪂🪂🪂

The hummerchute ride was a thrilling experience. Everyone should try this kind of adventure at least once in life. Much more comfortable and safe than paragliding. Also, the staff was good and friendly. Must visit Hummerchute Aamby Valley City, Lonavala.

My experience was lovely with very less wait time and the staff was very corporative. I was very exited and scared at the same time but everyone at the hummerchute made me comfortable and made sure I had the best experience of a lifetime.
Actually place is kundlika mata temple, near bhamburade and bapre villages, good Water falls and potholes. Very nice place.

places_with_reviews.name: Tail Baila Phata
places_with_reviews.address: H9F5+GPW, Tail Baila, Saltar, Maharashtra 412108, India

places_with_reviews.name: 129-D Chalet, Aamby valley
places_with_reviews.address: Unnamed Road, Aamby Valley City, Maharashtra 412108, India

reviews.text: Scerine..and peace in the kill middle of nature @ AmbyValley
Awesome place for all happy moments... Must go ...

Even in the non monsoon season, the place provides you with surreal views of the Tata Lake. The distant layers of mountains merging into the waters simply leaves you in awe!

The roads too are pretty much decent for cruising. There are a few patches where the roads are a Lil bad but not a big deal really, given the views you witness in the end.
A beautiful waterfall with a scenic view. Just one request to the visitors kindly do not litter & spoil such serene place 🙏

Amazing place, untouched. Good place to enjoy waterfall bath. Adjacent to main road so no trakin or hiking. Elders can also visit.
Place is a bit offbit so try to visit in group and in the morning. Avoid visiting alone or in the afternoon

reviews.text: Damn view from this location really is spectacular. Especially a little beyond this point say 200m.
